name: Verify user is able to add arrival receipt type data and perform physical count surplus adjustment

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to add arrival receipt type data and perform physical count surplus adjustment ({Receipt Type=Arrival, Currency=AUD, Product Type=Vaccine, Product=bOPV, Producer=PT ONEJECT INDONESIA, Commercial Name=BIOPOLIO B1/3, Formulation=Liquid: ready to use, Presentation=10, VVM Stage=1.Initial stage, Routine or SIA=Routine, Origin=Indonesia, Shipping/Freeze Indicator=Alarm, Storage Location=Ambient_2022, Units=20, No Of Vials=20, Volume=20, Total Cost=1000, Adjustment Type=Physical Count, Stock Quantity=25, Difference Quantity=5})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English
And User click on "Physical Count & Adjustments" tab
Click on tab: Physical Count & Adjustments
And User select "Physical Count" from "Adjustment Type" in "Physical Count & Adjustments" tab
Select value from dropdown physical count and adjustments: Physical Count, Adjustment Type
And User edit the details of arrival data created
Edit physical count and adjustments record
Then "Physical Count & Adjustments" heading is visible
Validate is heading visible: Physical Count & Adjustments
Validate value of web element: systemQuantity, 20
Validate value of web element: actualQuantity, 25
Validate value of web element: discrepency, 5
Validate value of web element: reasonOfAdjustment, Surplus
Then User click on acceptAdjustment checkbox
And User enter random text in "comment"
Then Arrivals data is updated successfully
And Updated "25" data is visible in Physical Count & Adjustments tab
Validate updated data on physical count and adjustments tab: 25
When User click on "View Physical Count Details" button in arrivals tab
Click on button: View Physical Count Details
Then User is able to see difference of updated quantity as "5"

userStory.storyName: Physical Count & Adjustments tab in SMT application for Store Operator user

userStory.narrative: We will be using this feature file for Physical Count & Adjustments functionality validations in SMT application mentioning all possible scenarios for Store Operator user.

title: Verify user is able to add arrival receipt type data and perform physical count surplus adjustment
backgroundTitle: User login to SMT application and navigate to Arrivals tab

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
And User click on "Physical Count & Adjustments" tab
And User select "<Adjustment Type>" from "Adjustment Type" in "Physical Count & Adjustments" tab
And User edit the details of arrival data created
Then "Physical Count & Adjustments" heading is visible
When User enter "<Stock Quantity>" in "countedQuantity"
And User wait for "5" seconds
Then Verify "systemQuantity" value is "<Units>"
And Verify "actualQuantity" value is "<Stock Quantity>"
And Verify "discrepency" value is "5"
And Verify "reasonOfAdjustment" value is "Surplus"
Then User click on acceptAdjustment checkbox
And User enter random text in "comment"
When User click on "Save" button
And User wait for "5" seconds
And User click on "Finalize" button
When User click on "OK" button
Then Arrivals data is updated successfully
And Updated "<Stock Quantity>" data is visible in Physical Count & Adjustments tab
And User click on "Arrivals" tab
And User wait for "3" seconds
When User click on "View Physical Count Details" button in arrivals tab
And User wait for "3" seconds
Then User is able to see difference of updated quantity as "<Difference Quantity>"
